data.tactical_summary: Reva lured the 7th Fleet into the dense asteroid field where superior Hegemony numbers counted for nothing. Using pre-positioned sensor buoys and intimate knowledge of the terrain, the Raiders executed a devastating ambush before melting back into the belt.
data.turning_point: Hegemony cruiser Relentless destroyed by asteroid collision while pursuing Raiders

narrative_summary: In a stunning upset, Captain Reva's outnumbered Raiders ambushed the Hegemony 7th Fleet in the Outer Belt, destroying two cruisers and eight destroyers while suffering minimal losses.
